title: AMD Mini PC - Vega 64 Liquid + Ryzen 1700X
description: AMD Vega 64 Liquid cooled with Ryzen 7 1700X vs GTX 1080, 1080 Ti and 1070 in the best itx case from phanteks. Phanteks Shift -  Ryzen 7 1700X -  Vega 64 -  Zowie 144hz 1440p Display -  Biostar X370 -  Corsair Ram -  Noctua CPU Cooler -  Powersupply -     Music Credits: Background: Fili - H2O  If you want to support the channel, consider a Dave2D membership by clicking the Join button above!      Purchases made from store links may give me some money.  (It doesnt cost you extra, so please buy everything)
